title: To direct the Secretary of Defense to establish a task force on urotrauma.
content: Directs the Secretary of Defense (DOD), in order to continue and expand the DOD report submitted in 2011, to establish the Task Force on Urotrauma to: (1) conduct a study on urotrauma among members of the Armed Forces and veterans. And (2) provide an interim and final report to the congressional defense and veterans committees on such study.
